document.full_text: pedro martinez, 39, who last pitched for philadelphia against the yankees in the sixth game of the 2009 world series, has never officially retired and is waiting for a call to help a team win a world series.
document.title: pedro martinez waiting for that one last call for help
lines_and_colors: pedro martinez, 39, who last pitched for philadelphia against the yankees in the sixth game of the 2009 world series, has never officially retired and is waiting for a call to help a team win a world series.
